    • Constructor Detail

      • MP3Reader

        public MP3Reader(java.io.File audio)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
        The construction of a WAVReader opens an AudioInputStream for the .wav file.
        Parameters:
        audio - .wav file to be read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception occurs when the input stream is initialized
        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException - if the file is not a valid audio file
